Here is a little something about me

Was an industrial engineer & PM in solar energy industry. Attended Hackbright Academy, a software engineering bootcamp for women. Finished in Dec 2019.

Am switching career to software development.

Why programming? I believe if one language is not enough to understand other people's thoughts and not enought to express my feelings, ideas and thoughts, then learn more languages, learn to speak in their language, learn to think from their logic.

I love learning programming languages, not only it changes the way I think things, it also helps me to embody the abstract thoughts in my mind.
